forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun is now gracing Downtown San Francisco with a gentle warmth, casting a golden hue over the cityscape. As the day unfolds, temperatures hover around a pleasant 70 degrees, creating a delightful atmosphere that invites outings. The west-southwest breeze, at a brisk pace, carries whispers of the bay and the distant sigh of the ocean — a perfect accompaniment to an afternoon spent strolling through bustling streets or enjoying a quiet moment in one of the city’s charming parks. The air is clear, with only a hint of fog lingering near the edges of the Golden Gate Bridge, hinting at the marine layer that often wraps the coast in its cool embrace.

As twilight approaches, the clouds will start to roll in, painting the sky with soft grays, and temperatures will ease into the inviting low 60s. With the breeze calming, it’s wise to consider a light sweater or jacket for the evening, especially if venturing out to explore the vibrant local dining scene or catching a show. This is a day for enjoying the simple pleasures — perhaps a leisurely walk along the waterfront, allowing the city’s sights and sounds to envelop you, or maybe finding a cozy spot to watch the world go by, sipping a warm beverage as the sun dips below the horizon, wrapping the city in its soft evening glow.
